Articles.Content:
Hello, I've been on the forum for a few weeks, but haven't really done anything with my account, so I decided to actually get off of my lazy **** and get involved in the community.

Generally I just play around with MechJeb and my modified 50000L fuel tank, but I'll probably start to do one or two challenges.

So far, the biggest thing I've done in KSP, is orbit the sun. The biggest community thing I've done is name the 500Km area around the north pole (The Alteran Circle, http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/10088-Invention-Kerbin-Geographic-And-Science-Society?p=232217 )

-Goraine
